entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
